item.title: NCAA College Bowl Pick'em Predictions
item.description: *Please read the Terms of Use if you are going to use the data This is the code from my presentation last week at the Omaha R User Group Meeting. A fun competition every year is to pick the winners for each college football bowl. I wanted to build a data-driven model to help me make this yearâ€™s picks. This post will walk through the process of obtaining data for predictions, building a couple predictive models, and then compare the results of the models.
